changeSet.author: Santhosh

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('Enhanced adherence counseling') and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Reason for Visit");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Reason for Visit

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: updating the sort weight for the set "Reason for visit"

changeSet.author: Santhosh
Santhosh
changeSet.comment: Creating Global Property for Enhanced Adherence Counseling Patient Queue
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO global_property (property, property_value, uuid) VALUES ('emrapi.sqlSearch.EnhancedAdherenceCounseling', '', uuid());

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Updating Global Property For Enhanced Adherence Counseling queue
changeSet.sql: update global_property set property_value = "select distinct concat(pn.given_name,' ', ifnull(pn.family_name,'')) as name, pi.identifier as identifier, concat('',p.uuid) as uuid, concat('',v.uuid) as activeVisitUuid, IF(va.value_reference = 'Admitted', 'true', 'false') as hasBeenAdmitted from visit v join person_name pn on v.patient_id = pn.person_id and pn.voided = 0 join patient_identifier pi on v.patient_id = pi.patient_id join patient_identifier_type pit on pi.identifier_type = pit.patient_identifier_type_id join global_property gp on gp.property='bahmni.primaryIdentifierType' and gp.property_value=pit.uuid join person p on p.person_id = v.patient_id join location l on l.uuid = ${visit_location_uuid} and v.location_id = l.location_id INNER JOIN (SELECT reason_for_visit.person_id,e.visit_id FROM obs reason_for_visit INNER JOIN concept c ON c.concept_id = reason_for_visit.concept_id AND reason_for_visit.voided = 0 INNER JOIN concept_name cn ON c.concept_id = cn.concept_id AND cn.concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' AND cn.name IN ('Reason for visit') INNER JOIN concept c2 ON c2.concept_id = reason_for_visit.value_coded INNER JOIN concept_name cn2 ON c2.concept_id = cn2.concept_id AND cn2.concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' AND cn2.name IN ('Enhanced Adherence Counseling') INNER JOIN encounter e on e.encounter_id = reason_for_visit.encounter_id) AS result ON result.person_id = v.patient_id AND result.visit_id = v.visit_id left outer join visit_attribute va on va.visit_id = v.visit_id and va.attribute_type_id = (select visit_attribute_type_id from visit_attribute_type where name='Admission Status') and va.voided = 0 where v.date_stopped is null AND v.voided = 0;" where property= 'emrapi.sqlSearch.EnhancedAdherenceCounseling';

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding "EAC Form, What was your baseline CD4 count?" to numeric table
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO concept_numeric (concept_id,hi_absolute,hi_critical,hi_normal,low_absolute,low_critical,low_normal,units,precise,display_precision) VALUES ((select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'EAC Form, What was your baseline CD4 count?' and concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' and locale = 'en' and voided = 0),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,1,NULL);

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding "EAC Form, What is the client's current viral load?" to numeric table
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO concept_numeric (concept_id,hi_absolute,hi_critical,hi_normal,low_absolute,low_critical,low_normal,units,precise,display_precision) VALUES ((select concept_id from concept_name where name = "EAC Form, What is the client's current viral load?" and concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' and locale = 'en' and voided = 0),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,1,NULL);

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept_set cs join concept_name cn on cs.concept_id = cn.concept_id where cs.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name ='Enhanced Adherence Counseling Template' AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") and cs.concept_set IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'All Observation Templates');
